content:
THE CONSERVATIVE PARTY’S leadership election is moving beyond Brexit and drug use—to taxes. The leading contenders have unveiled their tax-policy ideas over the last week, with some looking like blatant appeals to the party’s rank-and-file. With nominations for the leadership contest due today, the candidates are keen to boost their support among the party membership, who will have the final say on who becomes the next leader.

According to calculations by Torsten Bell, director of the Resolution Foundation, a think-tank, the average Tory plan would not affect the poorest tenth of British taxpayers. The mean earner would receive a tax break worth just £26 annually. Taxpayers in the top tenth of the distribution would get £2,500.

Mr Johnson’s proposal is particularly good for wealthy retirees, who pay income tax but not payroll taxes.Most Britons would gain little (unless, as some contenders claim, their tax cuts spark a widespread economic boom). But many affluent conservatives might be about to see their party memberships pay off.

The young people are the most eager to learn and the least  in their thinking.
青年人最肯学习，最少保守思想。

ex: adj. 富裕的；丰富的；流畅的
eg2: But most people in the world are not , and their food budgets are limited.
而事实是，世界上大多数人并不富裕，他们的食物消费还很拮据。
That  nations have produced half of the world's environmental destruction while paying only 3% of its costs.
富裕的国家付出只有3 ％的成本，却为这个世界制造了一半以上的环境破坏。

wp.blatant t: 显眼的;炫耀的;厚颜无耻的

ex: adj. 喧嚣的；公然的；炫耀的；俗丽的
eg2: By now, such blatant discrimination should be presumed to be unconstitutional, and the Justice Department should finally say so.
到目前为止，都认为如此公然的歧视是违宪的，法务部最后也会这样说。
It is not enough to give us the firm beliefs which we need to resist an enemy who uses propaganda as one of his main weapons not only in the most blatant but also in the most subtle forms.
它不足以给予我们坚定的信念，而我们需要它来抵挡一种敌人——他最重要的武器之一就是利用宣传，不仅最为喧嚣弥天，而且是诡诈阴险的形式。
Forcing every American to obtain health insurance is a  violationof the Constitution.
强迫每一位美国人接受健康保险公然违反了宪法。

eg2: Keynes assumes that a person's income depends on the consumption of the product being sold, and by extension believes that by not consuming, one is denying a wage  a wage.
凯恩斯认定一个人的收入受制于对正在出售的产品的消费。 进一步，凯恩斯还相信，一个人不消费，就是拒绝向工资劳动者给付工资。
"If we value families ... we need to change the circumstances they live in, " she said, citing the challenges faced by young, two- couples as they ponder having children.
她在谈及年轻的上班族夫妇在考虑要孩子时所面临的挑战时说：“如果我们重视家庭……我们就应该改变他们生活的环境。”
If your husband has been the higher , the longer he waits to collect, the bigger your monthly benefit will be after his death.
如果你的丈夫已经是高收入者，他领取社会保障金的时间越晚，在他去世后你每个月能领到的钱就越多。

wp.nomination process: 提名程序;提名过程;提名方式

这是她的首次奥斯卡提名。
He instructed his staff to crank up for an all-out fight against the .
他指示手下工作人员做好准备，全力以赴反对这项提名。
She was nominated for an appeals court judgeship in 1999. But the Senate never voted on her .
虽然她在1999年被提名为上诉法院法官，但是参议院从未就她的提名投票。

eg2: What do you propose we do?
你建议我们做什么?
We propose an early start tomorrow.
我们打算明天早早出发。
That is why in this blog post, I would like to  something to every designer: Why not try to design something every day for one year?
这也是这篇博客发表的原因，我希望建议每一个设计师：为什么不试试一年之中每天都来做点儿设计？

ex: n. 火花；电火花；火星；活力
v. 引发；触发；冒火花；飞火星
网络 斯巴达克；斯帕克；斯巴克
eg2: A shower of sparks flew up the chimney.
烟囱里飞出无数火星。
sparks from a faulty light switch
漏电的电灯开关发出的火花
A spark ignites the fuel in a car engine.
汽车发动机中的燃料由火花点燃。
a spark of hope
一线希望
As a writer he seemed to lack creative spark.
作为作家，他似乎缺少创作激情。
the sparks of revolution
革命的导火线
Sparks flew at the meeting(= there was a lot of argument) .
会上争论激烈，火星四溅。
The proposal would spark a storm of protest around the country.
这一提案将引发全国性的抗议浪潮。
Winds brought down power lines, sparking a fire.
大风刮断电线，引起了火灾。
The riots were sparked off by the arrest of a local leader.
骚乱是因逮捕一名当地领导人而触发的。
a sparking, crackling fire
噼啪直响、火星飞迸的火
The game suddenly sparked to life.
比赛突然变得激烈起来。

Title: Conservative Party leadership contenders propose tax cuts for high-earners
